General.Name: Blackout Media Corp
General.Description: Blackout Media Corp., a holding corporation in Canada, provides products in the areas of television, radio, publishing, music, and interactive spaces. It invests in high growth companies. The company was formerly known as First Canadian American Holding Corp. and changed its name to Blackout Media Corp. in January 2006. Blackout Media Corp. is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 6021 Yonge Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M2M 3W2

1.Name: Mr. Jose C. Salazar
